Articles.Content: It's coming! Saturday and 6th gen is here! Who's ready for the drop?
Already preordered Y, though I still needs to get a 3DS... I'm most likely going to buy a limited edition red Pokemon X/Y 3DS XL.

I would get Y, but I don't have the money at the moment.

WHYYYYYY
I'm getting Y. But I also need a 3DS, so I'm selling a bunch of my PS3 games (Black Ops, Black Ops 2, Medal of Honor: Warfighter, Madden 12, etc.). I should get about $6.83 at GameStop...
